description: INS_PRIMARY_BENEFICIARY Stores the primary beneficiary for the insurance details
INS_CANCEL_REASON_CD Reference key to lookup insurance cancel reason
INS_APP_ORIG_SYS_XREF Reference key to application id of legacy system
INS_COMPANY Stores the insurance company name
INS_PHONE_NO1 Stores the phone number #1 for the insurance transaction
INS_PHONE_EXTN1 Stores phone number extension for insurance details
INS_PHONE_NO2 Stores phone number for insurance details
INS_PHONE_EXTN2 Stores the phone number #2 for the insurance details
INS_POLICY_NBR Stores insurance policy number
INS_EFFECTIVE_DT Stores insurance effective date
INS_TERM Stores insurance term
INS_EXPIRY_DT Stores insurance expiry date
INS_PREMIUM_AMT Stores the premium amount for the insurance
INS_SECONDARY_BENEFICIARY Stores secondary beneficiary for the insurance
INS_CANCEL_DT Stores Insurance cancellation date
INS_CANCEL_TERM_REM The remaining term of the contract at the time of cancellation
INS_REFUND_AMT_EST Stores the estimated refund amount for the insurance
INS_REFUND_AMT_RCVD Stores the refund amount received from the insurance company
INS_COMPLETE_REFUND_RCVD_IND Indicates the complete refund received
INS_INSURANCE_TYPE_CD Reference key to lookup insurance type
INS_SUB_TYPE_CD Reference key to lookup insurance sub type
INS_COMMENT Stores the comment for the insurance details
INS_REFUND_ALLOWED_IND Indicates whether or not the insurance cancellation is allowed
INS_REFUND_CALC_METHOD_CD Stores the contract method that is used to calculate refund in the event of insurance cancellation
INS_CONTRACT_IND Indicates if the insurance was part of contract
INS_INSURANCE_STATUS_CD Reference key to lookup insurance status
INS_INSURANCE_MODE_CD Reference key to lookup insurance mode
INS_CANCEL_FEE Stores the insurance cancellation fee amount
INS_GRACE_PERIOD_FEE_IND Indicates whether or not cancellation fee could be charged during grace days
INS_CANCEL_GRACE_DAYS The number of days that allows insurance cancellation without fee
INS_CANCEL_FEE_FROM_CD Cancel fee from rebate or premium possible values PRM/RBT/NULL
INS_TXN_DT Date of Transaction
CREATED_BY Standard Who
INS_PIN_CODE Pin Code
CREATION_DATE Standard Who
INS_TXN_DT Date of Transaction
